item.title: NM-152 West at I-25
item.description: NM-152 West at I-25 in rural Sierra County.

item.title: I-25 North Offramp (Exit 63) at NM-152
item.description: I-25 North Exit 63 offramp at NM-152. Turn left for NM-152 west to Hillsboro and Silver City.

item.title: NM-152 East Approaching NM-187
item.description: End NM-152 east approaching NM-187, in rural Sierra County.

item.title: NM-152 East at I-25
item.description: NM-152 east at I-25. Turn right for I-25 south to Las Cruces; continue under overpass for I-25 north to Socorro.

item.title: NM-152 East at NM-27
item.description: NM-152 east at NM-27 south to Deming and Lake Valley. Continue east on NM-152 for Truth or Consequences (T or C).

item.title: NM-152 East Approaching NM-27
item.description: NM-152 east approaching NM-27 south in Hillsboro.

item.title: NM-152 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-152 east. Distance to Hillsboro and Truth or Consequences.

item.title: NM-152 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-152 east. Distance to Kingston and Hillsboro.

item.title: NM-152 East at NM-61 South
item.description: NM-152 east at NM-61 south. Turn right for NM-61 south to Deming; continue straight for NM-152 east for Kingston.

item.title: NM-152 East at NM-35 Jct.
item.description: NM-152 east at NM-35 junction in Grant County.

item.title: NM-152 East at NM-356
item.description: NM-152 east at NM-356. Turn right NM-356 south for Bayard. Continue ahead on NM-152 for Santa Rita. Turn left for Fierro.

item.title: US-180 East at NM-152
item.description: US-180 east at NM-152 in Santa Clara.

item.title: US-180 East at NM-152
item.description: US-180 east at NM-152. Use NM-152 for Hanover. Continue east on US-180 for Bayard; turn right for Santa Clara.

item.title: US-180 East at NM-152
item.description: US-180 east at NM-152 junction in Santa Clara.
